channel.title: Whitescape
channel.description:
Ok I found a tut on how to make a new player join in but I still get this when I try to log in
[code]ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2000 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 at Player.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.<init>(Unknown Source) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(Unknown Source) at server.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595) [/code]

item.title: Whitescape

item.description:
@henry wrote:

You get that when you try to log in because you cant log in for more than 1 times… because you cant make an account with out logging in…
